name: CRETestsForEnterobacteralesSpeciesExcludingProteusSppProvidenciaSppAndMorganellaSppByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: CRE (Tests for Enterobacterales species [excluding Proteus spp., Providencia spp., and Morganella spp.] by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with testsÂ for Enterobacterales species [excluding Proteus spp., Providencia spp., and Morganella spp.]by culture),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Budvicia|Edwardsiella|Hafnia|Serratia|Yersinia|Cedecea|Citrobacter|Cronobacter|Enterobacter|Escherichia|Klebsiella|Kluyvera|Leclercia|Raoultella|Salmonella|Shigella|Erwinia|Pantoea|Dickeya),(Exclusion Criteria: Providencia|Morganella|Proteus)
